LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.label: Bionic Longjump
LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.description: Jump to a distant location using bionic muscles.
LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.verbProperties.label: jump
LanguageData.DMS_MissileLauncher.label: Launch missile
LanguageData.DMS_MissileLauncher.description: Launch a guided missile to destroy enemies from long ranges.
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.label: Self-repair
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.description: Initialize self-repair mode to rebuild missing parts, all sensors will temporarily be disabled to prevent electrical damage.
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.verbProperties.label: initialize self-repair mode
LanguageData.DMS_SmokeLauncher.label: Particle smoke barrage
LanguageData.DMS_SmokeLauncher.description: Launch an antiparticle smoke screen to interfere with incoming charged munitions.
